name: Yellow Helix
description:
Yellow is the name of the game (literally and metaphorically) The only block that can be jumped on is yellow. Speed through each level as fast as possible. Be as perfect as possible and take every shortcut you can find!

Good luck Everyone!

Main Features:

  • 2D Platformer
  • Respawn Quickly
  • Simple Art

Controls:

  • D (move right)
  • A (move left)
  • Space (jump)

Install instructions:

  1. Put zip file in folder of one’s choosing 
  2. Right click zip file
  3. Go to “extract here”
  4. Press Boxen.exe

So some quick real talk: this is my first game and I’m not sure if it’s good or not. I would definitely appreciate any feedback so I can try to hone my craft and get better at making my next game!

Quick disclaimer, this "game" is decently unfinished and very short.

Thank you for your time, have a wonderful day!
